column5: My place is close to Louie's Backyard, Marlin Grocery Store and lots family-friendly activities. Youâ€™ll love my place because the location is within walking distance of everything., Lots of energy in this area. Fireworks are launched right in front of condo. Condo comes with a boat slip and fishing pier. Nice swimming pool. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets).
